> ::: Jackle looks to Liono and then sends the mesage that they are to meet
at
> the beach. :::
>
> ::: Jackle ::: Commander Hell Beast, Liono Prime has decided to meet us on
> the beach...and he only wants to see You,Zardus, and Megatron along with
one
> escourt each. Personally, I think that idea is just plain crazy...we
should
> meet here at the base, properly.
>
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
>
> ::: Hell Beast recives the message from both Brightblade and Jackle while
> making his way through the forests. :::
>
> ::: Hell Beast, on broadcast to both Jackle and Brightblade :::
Brightblade I
> would love your company on this mission, please join us. And Jackle, tell

>
> ::: Putting down his comm, he looks at Zardus ::: Well, what are we to do?
